remarks: The evaluation of the variable of polynomials over subring yields the same result as evaluated as variable of the polynomials over the ring itself.  (Contributed by AV, 12-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evlsvarsrng.q $e |- Q = ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) $.
evlsvarsrng.o $e |- O = ( I eval S ) $.
evlsvarsrng.v $e |- V = ( I mVar U ) $.
evlsvarsrng.u $e |- U = ( S |`s R ) $.
evlsvarsrng.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
evlsvarsrng.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. A ) $.
evlsvarsrng.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) $.
evlsvarsrng.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
evlsvarsrng.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. I ) $.
evlsvarsrng $p |- ( ph -> ( Q ` ( V ` X ) ) = ( O ` ( V ` X ) ) ) $.
